content:
TITLE: Using Hume AI SDK for Expression Measurement Batch Inference
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use the Hume AI SDK to start an expression measurement batch inference job, wait for completion, and retrieve predictions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/humeai/hume-typescript-sdk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
import { HumeClient } from "hume";

const hume = new HumeClient({
    apiKey: "YOUR_API_KEY",
});

const job = await hume.expressionMeasurement.batch.startInferenceJob({
    models: {
        face: {},
    },
    urls: ["https://hume-tutorials.s3.amazonaws.com/faces.zip"],
});

console.log("Running...");

await job.awaitCompletion();

const predictions = await hume.expressionMeasurement.batch.getJobPredictions(job.jobId);

console.log(predictions);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using Empathic Voice WebSocket API in Hume AI SDK
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use the Empathic Voice WebSocket API for sending and receiving audio in the Hume AI SDK.
SOURCE: https://github.com/humeai/hume-typescript-sdk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
import { HumeClient } from "hume";

const hume = new HumeClient({
    apiKey: "<>",
    secretKey: "<>",
});

const socket = hume.empathicVoice.chat.connect();

socket.on("message", (message) => {
    if (message.type === "audio_output") {
        const decoded = Buffer.from(message.data, "base64");
        // play decoded message
    }
});

// optional utility to wait for socket to be open
await socket.tillSocketOpen();

socket.sendUserInput("Hello, how are you?");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using WebSocket Request-Reply Pattern for Streaming Expression Measurement
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use the WebSocket request-reply pattern for streaming expression measurement API in the Hume AI SDK.
SOURCE: https://github.com/humeai/hume-typescript-sdk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
import { HumeClient } from "hume";

const hume = new HumeClient({
    apiKey: "YOUR_API_KEY",
});

const socket = hume.expressionMeasurement.stream.connect({
    config: {
        language: {},
    },
});

for (const sample of samples) {
    const result = await socket.sendText({ text: sample });
    console.log(result);
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Accessing Different API Namespaces in Hume AI SDK
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to access different API namespaces (Expression Measurement and Empathic Voice) within the Hume AI SDK.
SOURCE: https://github.com/humeai/hume-typescript-sdk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
import { HumeClient } from "hume";

const hume = new HumeClient({
    apiKey: "YOUR_API_KEY"
});

hume.expressionMeasurement. // APIs specific to Expression Measurement

hume.emapthicVoice. // APIs specific to Empathic Voice
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Handling Errors in Hume AI SDK
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to handle errors, including timeout errors, when using the Hume AI SDK.
SOURCE: https://github.com/humeai/hume-typescript-sdk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
import { HumeError, HumeTimeoutError } from "hume";

try {
    await hume.expressionMeasurement.batch.startInferenceJob(/* ... */);
} catch (err) {
    if (err instanceof HumeTimeoutError) {
        console.log("Request timed out", err);
    } else if (err instanceof HumeError) {
        // catch all errros
        console.log(err.statusCode);
        console.log(err.message);
        console.log(err.body);
    }
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Retries in Hume AI SDK
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to configure retry behavior for specific HTTP status codes in the Hume AI SDK.
SOURCE: https://github.com/humeai/hume-typescript-sdk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await hume.expressionMeasurement.batch.startInferenceJob(..., {
    maxRetries: 0, // disable retries
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Timeout for Hume AI SDK Operations
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to set a custom timeout for operations in the Hume AI SDK.
SOURCE: https://github.com/humeai/hume-typescript-sdk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await hume.expressionMeasurement.batch.startInferenceJob(..., {
    timeoutInSeconds: 10, // timeout after 10 seconds
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Hume AI TypeScript SDK
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Hume AI TypeScript SDK using npm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/humeai/hume-typescript-sdk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm i hume
```

TITLE: BibTeX Citation for 'Sixteen facial expressions occur in similar contexts worldwide'
DESCRIPTION: BibTeX reference for Cowen et al.'s 2021 paper on cross-cultural patterns of facial expressions published in Nature.
SOURCE: https://github.com/humeai/hume-typescript-sdk/blob/main/CITATIONS.md#2025-04-23_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: bibtex
CODE:
```
@article{cowen2021sixteen,
  title={Sixteen facial expressions occur in similar contexts worldwide},
  author={Cowen, Alan S and Keltner, Dacher and Schroff, Florian and Jou, Brendan and Adam, Hartwig and Prasad, Gautam},
  journal={Nature},
  volume={589},
  number={7841},
  pages={251--257},
  year={2021},
  publisher={Nature Publishing Group}
}
```
